title: Geer en Goor: waarheen, waarvoor?
overview: For a moment go Gerard Joling and Gordon rollebollend not on the street, but they join forces for Their New Program Geer & Goor: Where, What? Just like smacking into ff Not a penny, the two presenters in action for the elderly in the Netherlands. This time they go to the seniors on a trip, for example to the Veluwe, Lourdes from Paris. They let out small and big wishes.
